        <general>
          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">How it's Made: Snowboards</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wie sie gebildet wird: Snowboards</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Comment il est fait : Snowboards</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Como é feito: Snowboards</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Come è fatto: Snowboards</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πώς γίνεται: Snowboards</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cómo se hace: Snowboards</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The making of a snowboard, from a piece of wood to the high-performance final product.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Bilden eines snowboard, von einem Stück Holz 
zum leistungsstarken abschließenden Produkt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La fabrication d'un snowboard, à partir d'un 
morceau de bois au produit final à rendement élevé.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Fazer de um snowboard, de uma parte de madeira ao 
produto final high-performance.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Fare di uno snowboard, da una parte di legno al 
prodotto finale ad alto rendimento.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η παραγωγή ενός snowboard, από ένα κομμάτι του 
ξύλου στο υψηλής απόδοσης τελικό προϊόν.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La fabricación de un snowboard, de un pedazo de 
madera al producto final de alto rendimiento.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
